meta.name: keywords
meta.content: Jeopardy Archive Terence Scroope Ariel Schneider Tom Zamojcin Final clue response question answer Daily Double

meta.name: description
meta.content: An archive of clues and players for Jeopardy! show #6033.

td.p: Terence Scroope, an online marketing consultant originally from Dobbs Ferry, New York
Ariel Schneider, a biology student from West Lafayette, Indiana
Tom Zamojcin, a digital marketing manager from Phoenixville, Pennsylvania (whose 1-day cash winnings total $22,800)

tr.td: AFTER ALASKA...
BEST PICTURE OSCAR WINNERS
TICKLE THE IVORIES
DEATH COMES FOR THE ARCHBISHOP
MY "B*FF"
(Alex: Each correct response will begin with the letter B, and there will be two "F"s in that word.)
STUPID ANSWERS

body.div: The J! Archive is created by fans, for fans. The Jeopardy! game show and all elements thereof, including but not limited to copyright and trademark thereto, are the property of Jeopardy Productions, Inc. and are protected under law. This website is not affiliated with, sponsored by, or operated by Jeopardy Productions, Inc. Join the discussion at JBoard.tv.
